name: Daily Routines (georgina skr)
description:
Daily Routines is a game designed with the purpose of dealing with a real-world problem leveraging the benefits of a fun environment, for people with Alzheimer’s disease. It consists of three mini-games that aim to improve attention, memory, visual and spatial perception abilities, as well as their self-expression skills, since patients often have difficulties choosing the right word to express themselves and identifying objects. Furthermore, every mini-game is adapted to match the player’s skills through the collection and processing of specific statistical data that record his performance.

-------------------------------------------

Controls:
  • W/A/S/D - Move
  • M  - Menu
  • Mouse -  Move  the Camera 
  • LeftMouse Button/E  - Interact
